sentences.english: The relationship between bond valence and bond covalency has been investigated by a semiempirical method.

sentences.english: Objective To study the cultural characteristics of Armillaria mellea (A. mellea )on solid media.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究蜜环菌的固体培养特性。

sentences.english: Composting is a general treatment method for organic solid waste.

sentences.english: Description: This is the reductor curse, it will blast apart a solid object.

sentences.english: Mercury is an exception to the rule that metals are solid at room temperature.
sentences.chinese: 水银是金属在室温内为固体这条规则的例外。

sentences.english: Objective To prepare apigenin (AP) solid dispersion and measure its dissolution in vitro.

sentences.english: But water infusion may cause the charging structure displacing or escaping.

sentences.english: The hydrogel is one kind of package watery solid, has the extremely thin blowhole.

sentences.english: Lyophilization(freeze-drying) is the most commonly used method for preparing solid protein pharmaceuticals.

sentences.english: Meanwhile the solid by-products, rich in energy, could be incinerated as well.

sentences.english: It is specially established to prepare solidified alcohol in applied chemistry experiment.

sentences.english: Liquid crystalline epoxy resin is a kind of liquid crystalline thermosets .

sentences.english: Increase of solid food and snacks in between meals are the two concepts.

sentences.english: Nonmetals are generally gases or soft solids that do not conduct electricity.
